title: Bug 14113 Should listen to FSOURCEATTACHED and FSOURCEDETACHED java deltas
description: Bug 14113 should listen to FSOURCEATTACHED and FSOURCEDETACHED java deltas.
OB: Currently, when one changes the attached source of a JAR file, a FREMOVEDFROMCLASSPATH java delta is fired, which is incorrect. As a result, the UI responds by closing the class file editors that were opened for this JAR. This behavior is appropriate for a FREMOVEDFROMCLASSPATH java delta. However, when I attempted to fix the delta to be an (FSOURCEDETACHED | FSOURCEATTACHED) delta, the UI did not respond as expected.
EB: In this case, I expect the software to refresh the class file editor to incorporate the new source. To address this issue, I propose firing a (FREMOVEDFROMCLASSPATH | FSOURCEDETACHED | FSOURCEATTACHED) delta, and removing the FREMOVEDFROMCLASSPATH delta once this bug is resolved.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Change the attached source of a JAR file.
2. Observe the firing of a FREMOVEDFROMCLASSPATH java delta instead of an (FSOURCEDETACHED | FSOURCEATTACHED) delta.
3. Attempt to fix the delta to be an (FSOURCEDETACHED | FSOURCEATTACHED) delta.
4. Notice that the UI does not respond as expected.
